Package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands

Class ListBooks

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands.ListBooks
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class ListBooks
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
Shows a list of all library books to the user.

It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute(Library, LocalDate) method displays a list of the library books to the user. At the end of the list, the total amount of books in the library is also displayed to the user.

It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "listbooks" command is given by the user.

See Also:
Command, execute(Library, LocalDate), CommandParser

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute​(Library library, java.time.LocalDate currentDate) throws LibraryException
      Description copied from interface: Command
      The function that executes the Command given by the user.

      All classes that implement the Command interface must provide an implementation of this method. the function takes as argument a Library object containing all the books and patrons that exist on the library system and uses it to make the changes instructed from the command given by the user.

      The function also takes a LocalDate object with the current date to be used by commands that need this information when executed (e.g. when a book is borrowed or returned ).

      Specified by:
      execute in interface Command
      Parameters:
      library - the library object to perform actions based on the command given
      currentDate - an object holding the current date
      Throws:
      LibraryException - if something goes wrong with the execution of the command
      See Also:
      Library, LocalDate, BorrowBook, ReturnBook
